title: Quarterstaves
content:
Quarterstaves in Baldur's Gate 3 are pieces of equipment that are used to inflict damage against hostile characters such as Enemies and Bosses. Quarterstaves are Versatile Simple Weapons in BG3 that can be one-handed or two-handed, dealing 1-6 Damage when one-handed and 1-8 damage when two-handed. They have a range of 1.5m, and they deal Bludgeoning Damage, though some special Quarterstaves also deal another type of Damage as well.

Many Quarterstaves have unique properties, so you should read carefully what these do, and many also have Weapon Actions that can only be used if you are Proficient with Quarterstaves in BG3. These Weapon Actions include Topple.
